lyrics:
49 contributorsaftertaste lyricsverse 1
rerewind friday night never forget it
how you let me go
no more lies ill be fine know where im headed
probably shoulda known

prechorus
and now youre gonna say pretty please forgive me yeah
fooled me once told you twice youre gonna regret it
now youre all alone yeah

chorus
turns out that no one can replace me
im permanent you cant erase me
ill help you remember me one more kiss is all it takes
ill leave you with the memory and the aftertaste

verse 2
close your eyes you cant hide try to forget me
but im everywhere
im the smell on your sheets you werent ready
when you left me there

prechorus
and now youre gonna say pretty please forgive me yeah
yeah bet it hurts it gets worse you know nobody
said it would be fair oh
you might also likechorus
turns out that no one can replace me
im permanent you cant erase me
ill help you remember me one more kiss is all it takes
ill leave you with the memory and the aftertaste

bridge
and now theres something in your way
cause you threw it all to waste
and you wonder if you could take back what you did that day
and it hurts cause

chorus
turns out that no one can replace me
im permanent you cant erase me
ill help you remember me one more kiss is all it takes
ill leave you with the memory and the aftertaste
truth is that no one can replace me
im permanent you cant erase me
ill help you remember me one more kiss is all it takes
ill leave you with the memory and the aftertaste

outro
and the aftertaste46embed
